blocks.name: cuvtx
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the universal vertices (in a graph).
blocks.origin: const class cuvtx { UnivVtx }

blocks.name: diff.cuvtx.s
diff.cuvtx.c
diff.cuvtx.w
df-uvtx
blocks.content: Define the class of all universal vertices (in graphs). A vertex is called _universal_ if it is adjacent, i.e. connected by an edge, to all other vertices (of the graph), or equivalently, if all other vertices are its neighbors. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 24-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: uvtxval
blocks.content: The set of all universal vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtri(cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))), crab(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  fvmptrabfv(s0, hs0, cuvtx, c0, cvtx, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cdif(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  df-uvtx(hs0, s0, s1)
  raleqbidv(s1, cdif(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cnbgr, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))
  difeq1d(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cvtx, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cvtx)
  eleq2d(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cnbgr, cv(s0)), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))
  rabeqi(s0, cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  eqcomi(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cvtx)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uvtxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (UnivVtx ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))}
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((UnivVtx ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))}, d(s1, c1))
  eqtri((UnivVtx ` c0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))}, { s0 ‚àà(Vtx ` c0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))})
  fvmptrabfv(s0, hs0, cuvtx, c0, cvtx, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà((Vtx ` hs0)\ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(hs0[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  df-uvtx(hs0, s0, s1)
  raleqbidv(s1, ((Vtx ` hs0)\ { s0 }), (c1 \ { s0 }), hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà(hs0[NeighbVtx]s0), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))
  difeq1d((Vtx ` hs0), { s0 }, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Vtx ` hs0), c1, (Vtx ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cvtx)
  eleq2d(s1, (hs0[NeighbVtx]s0), (c0[NeighbVtx]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cnbgr, s0)
  rabeqi(s0, (Vtx ` c0), c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  eqcomi((Vtx ` c0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cvtx)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cvtx, c0)
  diff.cvtx.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: uvtxel
blocks.content: A universal vertex, i.e. an element of the set of all universal vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtxel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1), c2, wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs0)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))
  difeq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq2d(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs0)), co(c1, cnbgr, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cnbgr)
  uvtxval(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uvtxel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, (UnivVtx ` c1), c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 }), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]hs0)))
  raleqbidv(s0, (c2 \ { hs0 }), (c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 = c0, s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]hs0), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))
  difeq2d(c2, { hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  eleq2d(s0, (c1[NeighbVtx]hs0), (c1[NeighbVtx]c0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, c1, cnbgr)
  uvtxval(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: uvtxisvtx
blocks.content: A universal vertex is a vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: uvtxssvtx
blocks.content: The set of the universal vertices is a subset of the set of all vertices. (Contributed by AV, 23-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: vtxnbuvtx
blocks.content: A universal vertex has all other vertices as neighbors. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: uvtxnbgrss
blocks.content: A universal vertex has all other vertices as neighbors. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: uvtxnbgrvtx
blocks.content: A universal vertex is neighbor of all other vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtxnbgrvtx(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  ralrimiv(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0))))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
  vtxnbuvtx(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  com23(wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0))))
  expcom(wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c0))), wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c0))), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))
  rspcva(hs0, cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, co(c1, cnbgr, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cnbgr, cv(s0)))))
  nbgrsym(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuvtx, c1)
  diff.cuvtx.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))
}

thm uvtxnbgrvtx(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0))), d(s0, c2))
  ralrimiv(s0, (c2 \ { c0 }), c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0))
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1), (s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 })‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))
  vtxnbuvtx(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  com23(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)), c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1), s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0))
  expcom(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)), s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), (c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1)‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0)))
  syl5ibcom((s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 })‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))), c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1), c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))
  rspcva(hs0, s0, (c2 \ { c0 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0), s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, (c1[NeighbVtx]c0))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c1), (s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)‚Üî c0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]s0)))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c2 \ { c0 }))
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))
}

blocks.name: uvtx0
blocks.content: There is no universal vertex if there is no vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtx0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cvtx, c1))
} = {
  syl5eq(cfv(cuvtx, c1), emptycls, crab(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  uvtxval(hs1, hs0, c1, c0)
  syl6eq(crab(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))), emptycls, crab(hs1, emptycls, wral(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs1))))), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  rabeq(hs1, c0, emptycls, wral(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs1)))))
  rab0(hs1, wral(hs0, cdif(c0, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cnbgr, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
}

blocks.name: isuvtx
blocks.content: The set of all universal vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm isuvtx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))))), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))))))
  uvtxval(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  rabbiia(s0, c1, wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0)))), wral(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2)))))
  ralbidva(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), w3a(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c2, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))

thm isuvtx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (UnivVtx ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2))}
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtri((UnivVtx ` c0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2))}, { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))})
  uvtxval(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  rabbiia(s0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2)))
  ralbidva(s1, (c1 \ { s0 }), s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2))
  syl5bb((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 })), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2), (((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2)))
  bitri(s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0), (((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2)), ((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2)))
  nbgrel(s2, s1, c0, s0, c1, c2)
  df-3an((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), s1 ‚â† s0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))
  syl5rbb((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 })), (((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0)‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2)), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2))
  rexbii(s2, c2, { s1, s0 } ‚äÜ s2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2)
  sseq1i({ s1, s0 }, s2, { s0, s1 })
  prcom(s1, s0)
  biantrurd((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 })), ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c2, { s0, s1 } ‚äÜ s2), ((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s1 ‚â† s0))
  jca((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 })), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), s1 ‚â† s0)
  anim12ci(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c1)
  id(s0 ‚àà c1)
  eldifi(s1, c1, { s0 })
  adantl(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚â† s0)
  eldifsni(s1, c1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.content: Characterization of a universal vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

thm uvtxel1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wrex(s1, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), c0), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1), c2, wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wrex(s1, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), c0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c3, wss(cpr(cv(s0), c0), cv(s1))))
  difeq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), wss(cpr(cv(s0), c0), cv(s1)))
  sseq1d(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), cv(s1), cpr(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  isuvtx(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.content: If a graph/class has no edges, it has universal vertices if and only if it has exactly one vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)

  exbidv(hs1, wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wral(hs0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls))), wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs1))))

thm uvtx01vtx(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = ‚àÖ ‚Üí((UnivVtx ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ ‚Üî(# ` c2)= 1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Edg ` c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(c0 = ‚àÖ, (UnivVtx ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, (# ` c2)= 1, { hs1 ‚àà c2 | ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs1 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]hs1))} ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs1 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]hs1))))
  neeq1d((UnivVtx ` c1), emptycls, { hs1 ‚àà c2 | ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs1 }), hs0 ‚àà(c1[NeighbVtx]hs1))}, c0 = ‚àÖ)

  ralbidv(s1, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cnbgr, cv(s0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2))
  nbusgreledg(c0, cv(s1), cv(s0), c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uvtxusgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üí(UnivVtx ` c0)= { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)})
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5eq((UnivVtx ` c0), { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)}, { s0 ‚àà c1 | ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0))}, c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  uvtxval(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  rabbidv(s0, c1, c0 ‚àà USGraph, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { s0 }), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2))
  ralbidv(s1, (c1 \ { s0 }), c0 ‚àà USGraph, s1 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]s0), { s1, s0 } ‚àà c2)
  nbusgreledg(c0, s1, s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cusgr)
  diff.cusgr.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: uvtxusgrel
blocks.content: A universal vertex, i.e. an element of the set of all universal vertices, of a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtxusgrel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), c1), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), c1), c3))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, c2, wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c3)))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0), crab(hs0, c2, wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c3))), wcel(c0, cusgr))
  uvtxusgr(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3)
  elrab(hs0, c1, c2, wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c3)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), c1), c3)))
  raleqbidv(s0, cdif(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), c1), c3))
  difeq2d(c2, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  eleq1d(cpr(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), c3, cpr(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  preq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(s0), c1), c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uvtxusgrel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)‚Üî(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }), { s0, c1 } ‚àà c3))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }), { s0, c1 } ‚àà c3)), c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c2 | ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 }), { s0, hs0 } ‚àà c3)})
  eleq2d(c1, (UnivVtx ` c0), { hs0 ‚àà c2 | ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 }), { s0, hs0 } ‚àà c3)}, c0 ‚àà USGraph)
  uvtxusgr(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3)
  elrab(hs0, c1, c2, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { hs0 }), { s0, hs0 } ‚àà c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }), { s0, c1 } ‚àà c3))
  raleqbidv(s0, (c2 \ { hs0 }), (c2 \ { c1 }), hs0 = c1, { s0, hs0 } ‚àà c3, { s0, c1 } ‚àà c3)
  difeq2d(c2, { hs0 }, { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  eleq1d({ s0, hs0 }, c3, { s0, c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  preq2(hs0, c1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }), { s0, c1 } ‚àà c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: uvtxnm1nbgr
blocks.content: A universal vertex has ` n - 1 ` neighbors in a finite graph with ` n ` vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 3-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uvtxnm1nbgr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1), cfv(chash, cdif(c2, csn(c1))), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, cfv(chash, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  fveq2d(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1))))
  uvtxnbgr(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, cdif(c2, csn(c1))), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, cfv(chash, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, cfn), wss(csn(c1), c2))
  fusgrvtxfi(c0, c2)
  snssd(c1, c2, wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)))
  uvtxisvtx(c1, c0, c2)
  hashssdif(c2, csn(c1))
  oveq2d(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, cfv(chash, csn(c1)), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c1)), nat1))
  hashsng(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm uvtxnm1nbgr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0))‚Üí(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)), ((# ` c2)[-]1), (# `(c2 \ { c1 })), ((# ` c2)[-](# ` { c1 })), (c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  fveq2d(chash, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1), (c2 \ { c1 }), (c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)=(c2 \ { c1 }))
  uvtxnbgr(c1, c0, c2)

  fusgrvtxfi(c0, c2)
  snssd(c1, c2, c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0))
  uvtxisvtx(c1, c0, c2)
  hashssdif(c2, { c1 })
  oveq2d((# ` c2), cmin, (# ` { c1 }), nat1, (c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), (# ` { c1 })= 1)

blocks.name: nbusgrvtxm1uvtx
blocks.content: If the number of neighbors of a vertex in a finite simple graph is the number of vertices of the graph minus 1, the vertex is universal. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 16-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm nbusgrvtxm1uvtx(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wi(wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1))), wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1))))
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1))))
  impbid2(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, csn(c1))))
  sseli(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1)))
  nbgrssovtx(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5bi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wne(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eldifsn(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wne(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c1))))
  nbusgrvtxm1(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cuvtx, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  uvtxnbgrb(c1, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cnbgr, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(chash, co(c0, cnbgr, c1)), co(cfv(chash, c2), cmin, nat1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nbusgrvtxm1uvtx(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí((# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)‚Üí c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
} = {
  ex((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1), c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0))
  mpbird(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)), c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0), (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)=(c2 \ { c1 }))
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1), (c2 \ { c1 }), ((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)))
  impbid2(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)), hs0 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }))
  sseli(hs0, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1), (c2 \ { c1 }))
  nbgrssovtx(c0, c1, c2)
  syl5bi(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)), hs0 ‚àà(c2 \ { c1 }), hs0 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]c1), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† c1))
  eldifsn(hs0, c2, c1)
  imp((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† c1)‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)))
  nbusgrvtxm1(c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, (# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1), (c1 ‚àà(UnivVtx ` c0)‚Üî(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)=(c2 \ { c1 })))
  uvtxnbgrb(c1, c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[NeighbVtx]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2 \ { c1 }))
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ‚àà FinUSGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(# `(c0[NeighbVtx]c1))=((# ` c2)[-]1)))
}

thm nbupgruvtxres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wi(wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wceq(co(c4, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, c5, wnel(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cop(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cres(cid, c6)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  ex(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wceq(co(c4, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3))))
  eqelssd(hs0, co(c4, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3))), wss(co(c4, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3))))
  syl5sseqr(co(c4, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c4), csn(c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  nbgrssovtx(c4, c3, cfv(cvtx, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c4))
  syl5eq(cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)), cdif(cfv(cvtx, c4), csn(c3)), cdif(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), csn(c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  difeq1d(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), csn(c3), cfv(cvtx, c4), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cfv(cvtx, c4)))
  eqcomi(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cfv(cvtx, c4))
  upgrres1lem2(s0, c4, c2, c1, c0, c5, c6)
  sylc(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c4, cnbgr, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cnbgr, c3)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3)))))
  anim1i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c3), cdif(c2, csn(c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c2, cpr(c1, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
